Schaumburg.Itasca station:
Itasca is a station on Metra's Milwaukee District/West in Itasca, Illinois. The station is 21.0 miles (33.8 km) away from Union Station, the eastern terminus of the line. In Metra's zone-based fare system, Itasca is in zone E.
Itasca Station is located near the Itasca Country Club.
